topics.body:
Hey you know I've been meaning to ask, but has anyone previously brought up this question? 

What would we do if a portal opened up to Equestria one day and it was definitely large enough for hundreds of people to go into? 

I mean aside from every brony on Earth trying to go through to live our lives out in the fantasy world of ponies, and magic, and friendship. 

I'm not sure the US government would be as well hospitable about allowing such a thing remain unprotected or for that matter they probably won't be as nice with ponies. 

I mean can you imagine the political fallout across the international scale? 

Russia and other countries/nations would want a piece of it.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539cf2b46368723861330100#post_539cf2b46368723861330100
